name: Wander (itch) (TeaShopGames)
description:
Title: Wander

Print to Play Genre: Card 

Game Rating: E 

 Game Overview:  A short text-based adventure game that only asks you to do one thing: wander. This was designed as a part of a module that revolved around elements of engagement. This included everything from gameplay and challenge to narrative devices and audio. To learn more about this we were tasked to use Twine 2 to create a short tex based adventure game.
